response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and expectations. Given its unique features and benefits, we believe it's worth more than its face value. Considering the quality and the value it brings, I propose a special introductory price of $7,500 for you. This offer is exclusive to you and reflects our confidence in its ability to significantly enhance your experience. Please let me know if this proposal aligns with your budget and if you have any questions about the product.", "product_price": 7500}
